Contact Related Information:
Contact George Brown College for information sessions, domestic and international admissions, fees, financial aid, or program advice:

Domestic Admissions: admissions@georgebrown.ca or visit the Admissions section.
International Students: Book a virtual meeting or submit an inquiry through the International Contact Us page.
Financial Aid: FinAid@georgebrown.ca or visit the Financial Aid section.
Entry Advising: Make an appointment to see an Entry Advisor and review frequently asked questions.
Centre for Business: business@georgebrown.ca (general inquiries) or contact Charlotte Goldfried, Program Co-ordinator, at charlotte.goldfried@georgebrown.ca for program-specific information. Phone: (416) 415-5000 ext. 2160.
